item.title: This Gen-Z Entrepreneur Doesn’t Believe In Work-Life Balance. Here’s Why He’s Wrong
item.description: As a rule, Gen-Z thinks differently about the world of work. But they’re not all the same.

item.title: White House’s Hassett Says U.S. Could Take Stakes in Other Chip Companies
item.description: The U.S. has already taken a 10 percent stake in chip-maker Intel.

item.title: How Coastal Communities Are Prepping for Hurricanes
item.description: As hurricane season rages on, seaside dwellers are finding innovative ways to mitigate storm damage. But it’s a moving target.

item.title: Why Science Says You Should Stop Hitting the Snooze Button, Starting Tomorrow
item.description: Because the snooze button is a symptom, not a cure.

item.title: This Fashion Brand Made $2 Million in Just 48 Hours. Here’s How
item.description: When competitors started to sell dupes of Guizio’s micro mini skirt, the founder had a clever solution.
